thread.title: India v England: Yuzvendra Chahal takes 6-25 to seal T20 series
thread.title_full: India v England: Yuzvendra Chahal takes 6-25 to seal T20 series

title: India v England: Yuzvendra Chahal takes 6-25 to seal T20 series
text:
Sam Billings was the first of six wickets for leg-spinner Yuzvendra Chahal Third Twenty20 international, Bangalore India 202-6 (20 overs): Raina 63 (45), Dhoni 56 (36) England 127 (16.3 overs): Chahal 6-25, Bumrah 3-14 India won by 25 runs Scorecard England lost their last eight wickets for eight runs as India powered to a 75-run win in the third Twenty20 in Bangalore to take the series 2-1. 
Chasing 203, the tourists were in the hunt at 117-2 after 13 overs following three Eoin Morgan sixes. 
Leg-spinner Yuzvendra Chahal got Morgan and Joe Root in two balls in figures of 6-25 as England fell to 127 all out. 
Suresh Raina and MS Dhoni both made half-centuries in India's 202-6, while Yuvraj Singh blasted 27 from 10 balls. 
More to follow.
